thread.title: 17 Petite Bloggers Who Will Give You Big Outfit Goals
thread.title_full: 17 Petite Bloggers Who Will Give You Big Outfit Goals

author: Nora Whelan
title: 17 Petite Bloggers Who Will Give You Big Outfit Goals
text:
View this image ›
instagram.com Hallie mixes sculptural silhouettes and poppy colors for a look that’s wonderfully whimsical. Check her out at @halliedaily on Instagram.
ID: 10390984 2. Sunita V View this image ›
instagram.com Sunita may be small, but her hair and versatile wardrobe pack a punch. Find her on Instagram at @sunitav_ .
ID: 10390592 3. Nadia Aboulhosn View this image ›
instagram.com Model/designer Nadia switches between ultra sporty looks and mini/otherwise curve-hugging dresses like the one above. Catch her at @nadiaaboulhosn .
ID: 10390940 4. Retro Flame View this image ›
instagram.com Erika is Irish; her style is iconic. She’s a pro at dressing herself to look super tall — or that could just be her use of low angle shots. Either way, you can find her at @retroflame .
ID: 10397850 5. Alterations Needed View this image ›
instagram.com Kelly mixes menswear expertly with more traditionally feminine shoes accessories. Look her up at @alteratnsneeded .
ID: 10397338 6. Love, Grey Skies View this image ›
instagram.com Tiffany Diana is always flaunting her curves in a mix of classically chic and edgy pieces. Find her at @tiffanydiana on Instagram.
ID: 10390970 7. Not Jess Fashion View this image ›
instagram.com Jess takes on New York in everything from jeans and cozy sweaters to velvet and glam minis. You can catch her at @notjessfashion .
ID: 10390555 8. The Fancy Pants Report View this image ›
instagram.com San Francisco-based Kate is a master of simultaneously looking elegant and comfortable. You’ll find her at @kateogata .
ID: 10390650 9. Alysse Dalessandro View this image ›
instagram.com Writer and clothing designer Alysse loves bright colors, graphic prints, body con styles, and everything else fat girls aren’t supposed to wear. Look her up at @readytostare .
ID: 10389550 10. Fancy Francy View this image ›
instagram.com Francy’s super fun style is just as infectious as her smile. Catch her on Instagram at @thefancyfrancy .
ID: 10405949 11. Lust for Life View this image ›
instagram.com Olivia chronicles her travels and wardrobe through moody photography. You can find her at @lustforlife .
ID: 10397111 12. Hello Framboise View this image ›
instagram.com Tam does pretty preppy perfectly. Look her up at @helloframboise .
ID: 10397062 13. Jessica Torres View this image ›
instagram.com Jessica’s feed is a mix of fierce ensembles and comedy gold. Find her at @thisisjessicatorres .
ID: 10389675 14. Extra Petite View this image ›
instagram.com Whether in classic camel or a bias-cut gown, Boston girl Jean’s style is always totally classic. Catch her at on Instagram at @extrapetite .
ID: 10397196 15. Sydne Style View this image ›
instagram.com Whether in a full-length tulle skirt, tailored jeans, or an adorably embellished minidress, Sydne is always a pleasant surprise. Find her at @sydnesummer .
ID: 10397006 16. Curvily View this image ›
instagram.com Whether she’s wearing metallic tops, interesting cutouts, or an iridescent bag, Sarah is seriously skilled at bringing futuristic details into everyday looks — oh, and she doesn’t believe in dressing to look slimmer. Catch her at @curvily .
ID: 10389659 17. Walk in Wonderland View this image ›
instagram.com LA-based Sheryl is sometimes casual in denim, sometimes fancy in silk, and always absolutely flawless. Look her up at @walkinwonderland .
ID: 10390798
